Reviews.Title: xperia sp
Reviews.Author: I <3 Sony
Reviews.Content: Packaging and equipmentThe sales package, as well as user manuals quickly, contains a battery charger with USB port and a USB data cable / microUSB and a pair of stereo headphones of good quality.ErgonomicsThe dimensions of Sony Xperia SP are of 130.6 x 67.1 x 10 mm for 157 grams of weight. Excellent ergonomics and very beautiful aesthetic lines of this device whose design is characterized by a plexiglass bar that acts as a status LED that lights up in different colors.UsabilityXperia SP is equipped with a processor Qualcomm Snapdragon MSM8960T dual core Krait from 1.7GHz, Adreno 320 GPU and 1GB of RAM memory that allow the system to be always fluid. The onboard memory is 8GB, of which 5.37GB available to the user, expandable via microUSB.MultimediaThe quality of photos taken with the 8 megapixel camera Xperia SP is generally good, not great, in any condition. Discrete, however, the video may have a maximum resolution Full HD at 30fps with autofocus. Very nice media gallery that can be enlarged or reduced by pinch. By viewing the photos, the LED bar will light up with the dominant color of the display. The video player has allowed us to play all our classic test files, including DivX, MKV and the Full HD. The audio player, the classic Walkman allows you to manage playlists, play music via DLNA and integrates "social." Present an equalizer and different systems of sound improvements. Playing music through the speaker, whose sound is strong and clean, it is possible to illuminate rhythmically RGB LED and the color will be "colored" with the album cover chosen.OVERALL RATINGSP Sony Xperia Mobile smartphone is a very balanced from every point of view. Excellent is the battery life of the phone part. Nice design. Only the display is slightly below par with regard to the visibility in direct sunlight and for blacks not well defined.

Reviews.Title: Amazing device
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: This phone is an amazing device, I sold my Xperia J and got this about 5 month's ago, I think it's a great product, Works really efficient, Fast, Sleek, And really responsive, I hope they bring out the KITKAT update for the OS, but overall this phone is a great buy, Camera works just great, I love all the features it have to offer, The system it self is smooth and really iconic design to the body, The back cover however has a bit of a problem it tends to pick up smudges and gets stained easily so I recommend a casing, It supports a lot of games and run them smoothly, I still play NFS Most Wanted and it works great, Phone overall experience is amazing I love how the NFC can be able to just touch and go.I think the phone is a great buy, Originally I wanted the Z1 but didn't have enough cash, So if you have a budget then this is the perfect phone if not, Get the Xperia Z1.

Reviews.Title: Good, but didn't live up to my expectations
Reviews.Author: Roxanna Calvo
Reviews.Content: Over all the phone was a great purchase. Was easy to connect to t-mobile. Signal is good, haven't had any problems so far. Internet runs above average speed. Look of it is sleek, fits pocket perfectly, also has very nice lighting effects for notifications and themes. The graphics on the screen could be better. Not super HD like I expected.Now the only issue I have with this phone is the front camera. Taking regular photos with the back camera come out great and clear. But the front camera to take a "selfie" for example is complete crap. Blurry and very foggy look in pictures and video chat. Also the flash is horrible. It makes all your pictures come out with a red tint to them.
